analytics.description: Monitor your business with interactive dashboards

teamManagement.description: Collaborate efficiently with your work team

dashboard.welcomeDescription: A smart dashboard to make decisions that drive your results

register.title: User Registration
register.subtitle: Complete the verification process to create your account
register.successMessage: Your account has been created successfully. You will be redirected to login shortly...
register.successAlertMessage: Sign in with your credentials to access the platform

documentCapture.title: Document Capture
documentCapture.placeDocument: Place your document inside the frame
documentCapture.useButton: Use the "Capture Now" button when ready
documentCapture.documentIdHelper: You must enter your document before capturing the photo
documentCapture.documentIdRequired: Please enter your document number before validating.
documentCapture.validationError: Error validating the document. Please try again.

instructions.title: Step-by-step instructions:
instructions.step1: Place the document inside the guide lines.
instructions.step2: Make sure it is well lit (no reflections or shadows).
instructions.step3: Prevent your hand from covering any part of the document.
instructions.step4: Keep the document centered and fully visible.
instructions.step5: The image must be focused and legible.

documentCapture.livenessFailure: Ã— Liveness proof failed. Please try again.

manualUpload.cameraDescription: ðŸ“¸ Capture the front and back of your document with the camera
manualUpload.manualDescription: ðŸ“„ Upload an image with both sides of your document (front and back)
manualUpload.dropZoneSubtitle: or click to select from your device
manualUpload.invalidFileType: Please select a valid image file

livenessDetection.title: Facial Identity Verification
livenessDetection.subtitle: Follow the on-screen instructions to complete your identity verification
livenessDetection.place: Place your face inside the oval
livenessDetection.positionFace: Position your face in the oval
livenessDetection.livenessSuccess: Verification successful! You are a real person.
livenessDetection.livenessFailure: Could not verify liveness. Please try again.

instructions.step1: Place your face inside the oval guide. The camera will start automatically.
instructions.step2: Keep your face centered until the system detects it. The oval border will turn green.
instructions.step3: When your face is detected AND you're still, a 5-second countdown will begin. DON'T MOVE.
instructions.step4: The photo will be captured automatically. If needed, use the "Capture Now" button.

livenessDetection.privacyNote: ðŸ”’ Your privacy is important. Images are processed securely and are not stored permanently.

documentFront.label: Document (Front)
documentFront.description: Capture the front of your document

documentBack.label: Document (Back)
documentBack.description: Capture the back of your document

receiptIdDoc.title: Identity Verification
receiptIdDoc.description: To continue with the process, please enter your identity document number
receiptIdDoc.documentIdHelper: The document must be between {{min}} and {{max}} numeric characters
receiptIdDoc.errorMinLength: The document must have at least 7 characters
receiptIdDoc.errorMaxLength: The document cannot have more than 15 characters
receiptIdDoc.infoText: Enter only numbers. This document will be used to verify your identity.

liveness.title: Live Face Verification
liveness.subtitle: Please follow the instructions to complete your face verification
liveness.noBytesFound: No image bytes found in session
liveness.instruction3: Complete the facial gestures as instructed (head movements, blinks, etc.)
liveness.instruction4: Wait for the verification to complete automatically

facialCapture.validatingLivenessSubtitle: This may take a few seconds
facialCapture.biometricNotMatch: Biometric identity does not match. Confidence: {{confidence}}% (Required threshold: {{threshold}}%). Please try again with better lighting and ensure your face is clearly visible.
facialCapture.noVerificationData: No verification data received from server

livenessCheck.title: Live Face Verification
livenessCheck.subtitle: Complete the facial gestures to verify your identity

validation.phoneMin: Phone must be at least 10 characters (including country code)
validation.phoneMax: Phone cannot be more than 20 characters
validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordUppercase: Must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.passwordLowercase: Must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.passwordNumber: Must contain at least one number
validation.passwordSpecial: Must contain at least one special character

helpers.password: Minimum 8 characters: uppercase, lowercase, numbers and symbols

alerts.verificationRequired: You must verify your phone number before continuing

instructions.step1: Place your face inside the guide oval
instructions.step2: Keep your face centered and well-lit
